protocol.name: P-MTAB-12069
text: Labeled aRNA was hybridized to Affymetrix ATH1 Genome arrays (ATH1) at ATLAS Biolabs (Berlin, Germany).

(Parameters: Chamber type = OTHER: hybridization performed at ATLAS Biolabs (Berlin, Germany), Quantity of label target used = 20, Mass unit = Micro gram, Tiny time unit = seconds, Volume unit = Nano litre, temperature = 45)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-12070
text: RNA extraction was performed with the RNeasy kit (Qiagen,
aRNA was synthesized with the MessageAmp II-Biotin Enhanced Amplification Kit (Ambion,
) using 1 µg total RNA and 7h in vitro transcription.
(Parameters: Extracted product = total_RNA, Amplification = OTHER: aRNA)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-12071
text: aRNA was labeled with biotin using the MessageAmp II-Biotin Enhanced Amplification Kit (Ambion,
starting from 1 µg total RNA and 7h in vitro transcription
(Parameters: Amount of nucleic acid labeled = 1, Amplification = OTHER: aRNA, Mass unit = Micro gram)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-12072
protocol.text: Five biological replicates at each timepoint were pooled before RNA extraction

protocol.name: Espinoza_Scanning protocol
text: Affymetrix ATH1 Genome arrays (ATH1) were scanned at ATLAS Biolabs (Berlin, Germany).
(Parameters: Scanning hardware = GeneChip Scanner 3000 [Affymetrix], Scanning software = Scanning software)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-12074
text: Arabidopsis thaliana accession Columbia (Col-0) was initially grown on soil for four weeks in short days (8 h light/16 h dark) before transfer to long days (16 h light/8 h dark) at a day/night air temperature of 20 C/18 C and 150 umol m-2 s-1 light. Experiments were started when the rosette was mature (40-45 d after germination) and completed before the inflorescence reached 1 cm.
(Parameters: start time = 0, stop time = 6, time unit = weeks, min temperature = 18, max temperature = 20, temperature unit = C, media = soil)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-12075
text: Experiments were started when the rosette was mature (40-45 d after germination) and completed before the inflorescence reached 1 cm.
Col-0 plants were transfer to continuous light, at air temperature of 20 C/18 C and 150 umol m-2 s-1 light.
Treatment was started 14 hours after dawn (ZT14), samples were taken at 0h, 2h, 6h and then every 4 hours.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-12076
text: Experiments were started when the rosette was mature (40-45 d after germination) and completed before the inflorescence reached 1 cm.
Col-0 plants were transferred to long days (16 h light/8 h dark) at a day/night air temperature of 20 C/18 C and 150 umol m-2 s-1 light.
Treatment was started 14 hours after dawn (ZT14), samples were taken at 0h, 2h, 6h and then every 4 hours.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-12077
text: Experiments were started when the rosette was mature (40-45 d after germination) and completed before the inflorescence reached 1 cm.
Col-0 plants were transfer to long days (16 h light/8 h dark) at a day/night air temperature of 4 C and 90 umol m-2 s-1 light.
Treatment was started 14 hours after dawn (ZT14), samples were taken at 0h, 2h, 6h and then every 4 hours.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-12232
protocol.text: The GCRMA algorithm was used to obtain expression estimates, based on Wu et al.,  J Am Stat Assoc, 99, 909-917 (2004)
